goal.en: “The contents of the course, provided more and more knowledge about the electro-optical properties of liquid crystals, will give the technology and principle for the applications of liquid crystals and their devices in detail. The students are expected to be trained for improving their ability of researches in academic and industrial fields. Moreover, the latest research results worldwide will also be given in this course. I hope that the students can further understand the field of liquid crystals after they take the course.“
goal.ch: 本課程將更深入介紹液晶材料在其他光電元件上的應用及相關技術原理，可讓學生能有更多元的修習課程。預期可建立起學生針對液晶相關學術研究以及產業研發之進階能力。此外，將介紹並說明近年來包含學術與產業界的最新且最熱門的研究成果，希望學生在修習該課程後在液晶光電領域有更進一步的認識與瞭解，並藉以呈現國際間最新的研究結果。

content.en:
1. Introduction to Liquid Crystals (LCs)
2. Transmissive LCDs
3. Reflective LCDs
4. Transflective LCDs
5. Bistable/Multistable LCDs
6. Projection display
7. Flexible displays and e-papers
8. Introduction to 3D displays
9. LC lenses
10. Other LC electro-optical devices
11. Polarization convertors
content.ch:
1. 液晶簡介
2. 穿透式液晶顯示器
3. 反射式液晶顯示器
4. 半反半穿式液晶顯示器
5. 雙/多穩態液晶顯示器
6. 投影顯示器
7. 軟性顯示器及電子紙
8. 3D顯示器簡介
9. 液晶透鏡
10. 其他液晶光電元件
